headline: Is Datadog (DDOG) Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Datadog is attractively priced or already reflecting high expectations, you are not alone in questioning what the current share price really offers. The stock last closed at US$110.33, with returns of 9.4% decline over 7 days, 19.3% decline over 30 days, 17.5% decline year to date and 2.7% decline over the past year. The 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 46.7% and 22.6% respectively. Recent headlines have focused on Datadog's role in cloud and observability...

headline: Why Is Datadog (DDOG) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of cloud monitoring platform Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) jumped 5.5% in the morning session after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismissed fears that artificial intelligence would cannibalize the enterprise software sector.

raw.headline: Why Is Datadog (DDOG) Stock Soaring Today
raw.summary: Shares of cloud monitoring platform Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) jumped 5.5% in the morning session after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismissed fears that artificial intelligence would cannibalize the enterprise software sector.

headline: Is Datadog’s (DDOG) Sakana AI Tie-Up Quietly Redefining Its Enterprise AI Moat?
summary: Earlier this week, Datadog, Inc. announced a partnership with Sakana AI to jointly research, build, and commercialize tools that help enterprises monitor, manage, and responsibly scale advanced AI systems, starting with large customers in Japan before expanding globally. The collaboration pairs Sakana AI’s foundation model research with Datadog’s observability and security platform, aiming to close the gap between cutting-edge AI innovation and dependable, production-grade deployment for...

headline: Howard Marks: AI Is Multi-Trillion Dollar 'Labor Replacement,' But Prediction Markets Disagree
summary: AI has moved from helping to replacing workers, leading to a potential multi-trillion dollar market. Recent examples show AI's increasing autonomy, but prediction markets suggest a 10% unemployment rate and industry downturn are unlikely.

headline: Jim Cramer Highlights the Strength of Cadence Design
summary: Cadence Design Systems, Inc. (NASDAQ:CDNS) is one of the stocks that was on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. Cramer discussed the stock during the episode and said: So where do I come out on this? headline: 87% of Organizations Are Running Software With Known, Exploitable Vulnerabilities, Datadog Finds
summary: The State of DevSecOps Report 2026 highlights a broader industry shift as security risk increasingly moves upstream into the software supply chainNEW YORK, Feb. 26, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the AI-powered observability and security platform for cloud applications, today released its latest State of DevSecOps Report, finding that nearly nine in 10 organizations (87%) have at least one known exploitable vulnerability in deployed services.
